column1: in memory of jared joseph blanchard -- pellerin funeral home| born: february 23
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:pellerin funeral homebreaux bridge
column6: 2015 send card. catahoula - funeral services will be held at 11:00 am
column10: at st. rita catholic church in catahoula
column15: 2015. the family requests that visiting hours be observed at dion hall in catahoula from 10:00 am until 10:00 pm on monday
column16: and continue on tuesday at 7:00 am until 10:30 am. a rosary will be prayed at 7:00 pm on monday. rev. richard fabre will officiate at the funeral service. interment will follow at our lady of the lake cemetery in catahoula. jared loved to fish and hunt. he enjoyed helping anyone who needed help. he loved his nieces
column18: and great-niece dearly. he enjoyed spending time with his family. he is survived by his parents
column19: carol joseph and marilyn le. blanc blanchard; his sister and brother-in-law
column20: brook b. melancon and mitchell; his sister
column28: faith la. borde. he is preceded in death by his paternal grandparents
column29: olden and bernice latiolais blanchard; maternal grandfather
column32: theresa broussard dugas. pallbearers will be jacob boudreaux
column37: and lee dugas. honorary pallbearers will be mitchell melancon and mckenzie melancon. pellerin funeral home
